Harbir Singh Hundal wrote:
> 
> Hello!!!
> I reallu do not undesrstand by what do u mean by
> webservice, but in case you mean webapplication, u can
> use HTTPUNIT to test the webapplication.

You can test the web user interface using HTMLUnit, XHTMLUnit, HTTPUnit, 
jWebUnit or any of its cousins.

You can test the entire application through the web user interface, but 
that's never been a good idea and it likely never will be.

You can test a web service by invoking its methods using XML over HTTP, 
but that's the same as testing a web application through the web user 
interface. For a single web service, there might only be 10 tests, so 
it's likely not as expensive as testing an entire web application.

The real value comes from testing the server side code without running 
it in a container. For that, read JUnit Recipes.
--
